Package it.polimi.ingsw.constant.move

Class MoveType

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.move.MoveType
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoveActiveProduction, MoveBuyDevCard, MoveChoseInitialResources, MoveChoseLeaderCards, MoveChoseResources, MoveDiscardResources, MoveEndTurn, MoveLeader, MoveTypeMarket, MoveWhiteConversion
public abstract class MoveType
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class that represent a possible move of a player and a possible message from client to server Include some standard methods reused in an appropriate way Each class that inherits must have an unique static attribute className of type String Before send each move to the server you must set all the possible parameter, otherwise the server will reject your move

    • canPerform

      public abstract boolean canPerform​(Game game)
      Simple check executed also on client side
      Parameters:
      game - of type Game - the game reference
      Returns:
      true if player status and game status allow move execution, false otherwise - do not ensure the move is possible

    • getClassName

    • simpleCheck

      protected boolean simpleCheck​(Game game, PlayerStatus[] allowedStatus)
      Parameters:
      game - of type Game - the game
      allowedStatus - of type PlayerStatus[] - an array containing the allowed status of players
      Returns:
      true if the player is part of the game and he is in any allowed status, false otherwise

    • initialMove

      protected boolean initialMove​(Game game)
      Parameters:
      game - of type Game - the game
      Returns:
